name: Hazelight Studios
detail:
Hazelight is a Swedish game development studio founded by Josef Fares in 2014. We are based in Stockholm with our offices located in the beautiful facility Münchenbryggeriet by the waterfront.

We aim to push the boundaries for interactive storytelling and engaging emotional experiences. The core team from the acclaimed Brothers - A Tale of Two Sons currently works at Hazelight.
Hazelight’s first game, A Way Out, was released on March 23, 2018 and published by EA under the Originals label.
